articles.title: Religious orgs. meet to discuss proposal of joint meeting
articles.content:
Dangerous challenge
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS 
REVEALED THEIR SINISTER INTENTION WHILE SOME PEOPLE WERE 
BUSYING THEMSELVES WITH THE "HWANG JANG YOP INCIDENT."
   THE PUPPETS MANIPULATED THE CHOONG-ANG ILBO AND OTHER 
PAID MEDIA FEBRUARY 27 TO CARRY FALSE REPORTS CONCERNING THE 
DEATH OF THE GREAT LEADER PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG.
   AS TO THE "HWANG JANG YOP INCIDENT," WE HAVE ALREADY 
CLARIFIED OUR POSITION THAT IF HE ASKED FOR ASYLUM, THE 
RENEGADE IS DISMISSED. THIS POSITION REMAINS UNCHANGED.
   THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS' SMEAR CAMPAIGN AGAINST OUR 
SUPREME HEADQUARTERS OVER THIS "INCIDENT" IS QUITE DIFFERENT 
IN CHARACTER FROM THE "INCIDENT" AND IS A GRAVE CHALLENGE TO 
THE NORTH.
   THE SOUTH KOREAN AUTHORITIES HAVE NOT YET APOLOGIZED TO 
THE NORTHERN PEOPLE FOR WHAT THEY DID THREE YEARS AGO, 
LACERATING THE HEARTS OF FELLOW COUNTRYMEN MOURNING OVER THE 
DEATH OF THE FATHER OF THE KOREAN NATION. THEIR SMEAR 
CAMPAIGN AGAINST OUR SUPREME HEADQUARTERS THIS TIME IS, IN 
FACT, A DANGEROUS CHALLENGE FOR ALL-OUT SHOWDOWN WITH THE 
NORTH. 
   WE WILL RETALIATE ON ANYONE WHO DARES SLANDER OUR SUPREME 
HEADQUARTERS, WHICH IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE NATION'S DESTINY 
AND FUTURE, WHEREVER HE MAY BE. THIS IS OUR UNSHAKABLE WILL. 
   WE WILL, IN TIME, MAKE THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS PAY 
DEARLY FOR THAT.
   THE SMEAR CAMPAIGN THIS TIME SHOWS HOW THE SOUTH KOREAN 
PUPPETS WILL USE HWANG JANG YOP AFTER TAKING HIM TO SEOUL.
   IF THEIR RECKLESS PROVOCATION BADLY AFFECTS THE STABILITY 
ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA, NOT ONLY THE MANIPULATORS BUT ALSO 
ACCOMPLICES, WHETHER THEY ARE PRESS MEDIA OR WHATEVER, 
WILL HAVE TO BEAR RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE CONSEQUENCES.
   WE WILL CLOSELY WATCH THE FUTURE MOVEMENTS OF THE SOUTH 
KOREAN PUPPETS.

articles.title: DPRK ambassador to India appointed
articles.content:
Religious orgs. meet to discuss proposal of joint meeting
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- MEASURES FOR CARRYING INTO 
PRACTICE THE PROPOSAL OF THE JOINT MEETING OF POLITICAL 
PARTIES AND ORGANIZATIONS OF THE NORTHERN HALF OF KOREA TO 
VIGOROUSLY CONDUCT A NATIONWIDE STRUGGLE TO REALIZE NATIONAL 
INDEPENDENCE AND DEFEND PEACE WERE DISCUSSED AT THE ENLARGED 
PLENARY MEETINGS OF THE C.C., KOREAN CHRISTIANS FEDERATION 
AND THE C.C., KOREAN BUDDHISTS FEDERATION AND AT THE 
ENLARGED PRESIDIUM MEETING OF THE C.C., KOREAN CATHOLIC 
ASSOCIATION HELD IN PYONGYANG FRIDAY.
   THE MEETINGS EXPRESSED FULL SUPPORT TO THE PROPOSAL OF 
THE JOINT MEETING FOR CONVENING A JOINT CONFERENCE OF 
REPRESENTATIVES OF POLITICAL PARTIES AND ORGANIZATIONS IN 
THE NORTH, SOUTH AND OVERSEAS THIS YEAR AND POINTED TO THE 
TASKS OF RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS AND BELIEVERS.
   THE MEETINGS APPEALED TO KOREAN RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS 
AND BELIEVERS IN THE SOUTH AND OVERSEAS TO ACTIVELY TURN 
OUT IN A NATIONWIDE STRUGGLE IN THE MIND OF TRULY WORRYING 
ABOUT THE NATION'S DESTINY AND ASPIRING AFTER THE PEACE AND 
PEACEFUL REUNIFICATION OF THE COUNTRY IN RESPONSE TO THE 
EPOCH-MAKING PROPOSAL OF THE JOINT MEETING.
   THEY UNDERLINED THE NEED TO HAVE POSITIVE CONTACTS AND 
DIALOGUES WITH RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS IN SOUTH KOREA AND 
OVERSEAS TO DISCUSS WORKING MATTERS OF VIGOROUSLY CONDUCTING 
A JOINT STRUGGLE FOR DEFENDING NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND 
PEACE AND CONVENING A JOINT CONFERENCE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF 
POLITICAL PARTIES AND ORGANIZATIONS IN THE NORTH, SOUTH AND 
OVERSEAS, AND ADOPTED RELEVANT DECISIONS.

articles.title: U.S. must discontinue broadcasting "Radio Free Asia"
articles.content:
Letter to s. Korean human rights orgs. from north
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- KIM HWA SIM AND KIM JONG 
SIM, DAUGHTERS OF THE OLD MAN KIM IN SO, AN UNCONVERTED LONG-
TERM PRISONER IN SOUTH KOREA, AND HIS YOUNGER SISTER KIM 
PONG SON, WHO ARE LIVING IN THE NORTHERN HALF OF KOREA, SENT 
A LETTER TO HUMAN RIGHTS ORGANIZATIONS IN SOUTH KOREA AS 
REGARDS THE SOUTH KOREAN AUTHORITIES' CONTINUED INHUMANE 
ACTS AGAINST KIM IN SO.
   THE LETTER WAS ADDRESSED TO THE HEADQUARTERS FOR THE 
PROMOTION OF THE REPATRIATION OF UNCONVERTED LONG-TERM 
PRISONERS KIM IN SO, HAM SE HWAN AND KIM YONG THAE, THE 
SOUTH KOREAN COUNCIL OF HUMAN RIGHTS ORGANIZATIONS, THE 
FAMILY MOVEMENT FOR REALIZING DEMOCRACY AND THE BAR 
ASSOCIATION FOR A DEMOCRATIC SOCIETY.
   THE LETTER SAID KIM IN SO IS AGAIN SUFFERING FROM ILLNESS 
AFTER HOSPITALIZATION FOR THE TREATMENT OF A SEQUELA OF 
CEREBRAL HEMORRHAGE. BUT, THE SOUTH KOREAN AUTHORITIES 
CONTINUE TO PERSECUTE HIS SPIRIT AND BODY BY ALL MEANS SO 
HARSHLY THAT HE CAN NEVER RISE AGAIN.
   THE LETTER ASKED THE SOUTH KOREAN HUMAN RIGHTS 
ORGANIZATIONS TO STOP THE AUTHORITIES' PERSECUTION AT ONCE 
AND EXERT CONTINUOUS EFFORTS FOR THE OLD MAN'S EARLY 
REPATRIATION.

articles.title: Press conference at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
U.S. must discontinue broadcasting "Radio Free Asia" 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- THE U.S. MOVES FOR 
IDEOLOGICAL AND CULTURAL INFILTRATION INTO ASIAN COUNTRIES 
HAVE BEEN IN FULL SWING.
   THE UNITED STATES REPORTEDLY BEGAN TO FORMALLY BROADCAST 
"RADIO FREE ASIA" IN SOME NATIONAL LANGUAGES DESPITE STRONG 
PROTEST OF THE ASIAN PEOPLE. THIS INTOLERABLE CHALLENGE CAN 
NEVER BE ALLOWED.
   THE RADIO IS AIMED AT SPREADING THE DECADENT AMERICAN WAY 
OF LIFE, IDEOLOGY AND CULTURE AS WELL AS THE POLICY OF 
STRENGTH TO PARALYZE THE NATIONAL CONSCIOUSNESS OF THE 
PEOPLE OF ASIAN COUNTRIES FOR INDEPENDENCE, OBLITERATE THEIR 
NATIONAL CULTURE AND REALIZE THE U.S. DOMINATION OVER THEM.
   THE UNITED STATES IS OPENLY VOCIFERATING ABOUT A "BIG 
ROLE" PLAYED BY THE "RADIO FREE EUROPE"  IN RESTORATION OF 
CAPITALISM IN EAST EUROPEAN COUNTRIES AND TRYING TO APPLY 
THE SAME METHOD TO ASIAN COUNTRIES. "RADIO FREE ASIA" IS A 
REPLICA OF THE NOTORIOUS "RADIO FREE EUROPE".
   THE UNITED STATES IS ATTEMPTING TO DESTROY ASIAN 
COUNTRIES WITH THE SAME "VIGOR AND WILL" AS IT DISPLAYED  IN 
DESTROYING THE "IRON WALL" IN EAST EUROPE. BUT THIS CAN 
NEVER WORK TODAY.
   THE U.S. IS INTENSIFYING ITS SINISTER IDEOLOGICAL AND 
CULTURAL INFILTRATION AND FALSE PROPAGANDA TOWARD THE 
COUNTRIES IN THE ASIAN REGION THROUGH "RADIO FREE ASIA" BUT 
THERE IS NO ONE WHO WILL LEND AN EAR TO IT.
   THE KOREAN PEOPLE ADVANCING UNDER THE BANNER OF SOCIALISM 
AND THE ASIAN PEOPLE WAGING A VIGOROUS STRUGGLE FOR 
INDEPENDENCE AGAINST IMPERIALISM WILL BE DISILLUSIONED AT 
THE RADIO NOT CONFORMING WITH THEIR IDEOLOGICAL EMOTION AND 
NATIONAL SENTIMENT AND DENOUNCE AND RIDICULE IT.
   THE UNITED STATES MUST DISCONTINUE BROADCASTING THE 
REACTIONARY "RADIO FREE ASIA" AS DEMANDED BY THE ASIAN 
PEOPLE.

articles.title: S. Korean trade unions go on strike
articles.content:
Foreigners mourn death of Kim Kwang Jin 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- DIPLOMATIC CORPS AND 
MILITARY ATTACHES' CORPS IN KOREA MOURNED THE DEATH OF VICE 
MARSHAL OF THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY KIM KWANG JIN, FIRST 
VICE-MINISTER OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMED FORCES, BEFORE THE BIER 
OF THE DECEASED ON FRIDAY.
   WITH THE DIRGE SOUNDING, THE MOURNERS LAID WREATHS AND 
OBSERVED A MOMENT'S SILENCE IN MEMORY OF HIM.
   THAT DAY, THE IRANIAN AMBASSADOR TO KOREA AND HIS EMBASSY 
OFFICIALS VISITED THE BIER TO MOURN HIS DEATH.

articles.title: Party, army officials visit bier of late Kim Kwang Jin
articles.content:
S. Korean trade unions go on strike 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- MORE THAN 131,000 PEOPLE 
OF 107 TRADE UNIONS UNDER THE CONFEDERATION OF TRADE UNIONS 
IN SOUTH KOREA WENT ON STRIKE FOR A LIMITED NUMBER OF HOURS 
FRIDAY, A SEOUL-BASED RADIO SAID. AMONG THEM ARE UNIONS OF 
HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY, HYUNDAI MIPHO SHIPBUILDING, DAEWOO 
HEAVY INDUSTRIES, SEOUL SUBWAY AND THE HOSPITAL OF SEOUL 
NATIONAL UNIVERSITY. 
   SOME 1,000 UNION LEADERS UNDER  THE CONFEDERATION 
HELD A MEETING THURSDAY, VOWING TO FIGHT FOR VICTORY IN THE 
FOURTH-STAGE GENERAL STRIKE. THEY DECLARED THAT UNLESS TEN 
DEMANDS INCLUDING THE REAMENDMENT OF "LABOUR LAWS" AND THE 
LEGALIZATION OF THE "NATIONAL TEACHERS UNION" ARE MET 
THEY WILL GO ON A GENERAL STRIKE FROM FEBRUARY 28.
   LARGE-SCALE RALLIES AND MEETINGS ARE SCHEDULED TO BE HELD 
IN REGIONS AND DIVISIONS DURING THE STRIKE.

Party, army officials visit bier of late Kim Kwang Jin 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- RANKING OFFICIALS OF THE 
WORKERS' PARTY OF KOREA AND INSTITUTES OF ARMED FORCES, 
OFFICIALS OF DIFFERENT ORGANS AND MEN AND OFFICERS OF THE 
KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY VISITED THE BIER OF THE LATE KPA VICE-
MARSHAL KIM KWANG JIN, FIRST VICE-MINISTER OF THE PEOPLE'S

   LAID BY THE BIER WERE WREATHS SENT BY THE WPK CENTRAL

NATIONAL DEFENCE COMMISSION, THE ADMINISTRATION COUNCIL, THE 
MINISTRY OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMED FORCES, THE MINISTRY OF 
PUBLIC SECURITY,  COMMISSIONS AND MINISTRIES OF THE 
ADMINISTRATION COUNCIL, PUBLIC ORGANIZATIONS, PYONGYANG 
MUNICIPAL PARTY, ADMINISTRATIVE AND ECONOMIC ORGANS,  UNITS 
AND MILITARY ACADEMIES OF THE KPA.
   KPA MARSHAL RI UL SOL, KPA VICE MARSHALS JO MYONG ROK, 
DIRECTOR OF THE GENERAL POLITICAL DEPARTMENT, KIM YONG CHUN, 
CHIEF OF THE GENERAL STAFF, PAEK HAK RIM AND OTHERS 
EXPRESSED THEIR CONDOLENCES.

articles.title: Reckless moves aggravating situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
S. Korean, foreign news media on aftermath of Hanbo Incident 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- SOUTH KOREAN AND FOREIGN 
NEWSPAPERS AND RADIOS REPORTED ABOUT THE SOUTH KOREAN 
ECONOMY THAT HAS BEEN DRIVEN INTO DEEPER CRISIS BY THE 
BANKRUPTCY OF HANBO GROUP SUBSIDIARIES CAUSED BY POLITICO-
BUSINESS TIEUP BETWEEN THE KIM YOUNG SAM PUPPET CLIQUE AND 
THE COMPRADOR BUSINESS.
   "TONGA-ILBO", "HANGYORE", "RADIO NO. 1" AND OTHER 
NEWSPAPERS AND RADIOS OF SOUTH KOREA DISCLOSED THAT WITH THE 
HANBO INCIDENT THE RATE OF DRAWING BILLS IN THE MONTH OF 
JANUARY, WHICH CANNOT BE SETTLED ACCOUNTS IN CASH, 
RECORDED HIGHEST IN 15 YEARS SINCE THE BILL INCIDENT 
INVOLVING JANG RYONG JA AND RI CHOL HUI IN 1982 AND THE 
FINANCIAL CIRCLES ARE UNDERGOING UNPRECEDENTED DIFFICULTIES.
   AFTER THE INCIDENT, 260 MEDIUM AND SMALL BUSINESSES HAVE 
GONE BANKRUPT IN SEOUL ALONE.
   THE AMOUNT OF DAMAGE UPON RELATED MEDIUM AND SMALL 
BUSINESSES HAS NOT BEEN MADE KNOWN, BUT IT WILL BE ABOVE 400 
BILLION WON, REPORTS SAID.
   THE AMERICAN NEWSPAPER WALL STREET JOURNAL SAID THAT THE 
HANBO INCIDENT IMPOSED A HEAVY BURDEN ON SOUTH KOREAN 
FINANCIAL ORGANS FRAUGHT WITH MANY PROBLEMS AND THAT IT WAS 
CAUSED BECAUSE LOANS ARE DECIDED BY "GOVERNMENT" OFFICIALS, 
NOT BY BANK MANAGERS. 
   MAINICHI SHINBUN, NHK TELEVISION AND OTHER PRESS MEDIA OF 
JAPAN SAID  THE POLITICAL AND FINANCIAL CIRCLES ARE CONFUSED 
BY THE HANBO INCIDENT AND COMPETITIVE POWER OF THE ECONOMY 
HAS DECREASED.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il's work rejecting abuses ofsocialism
articles.content:
Reckless moves aggravating situation on Korean Peninsula 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS ARE 
NOW TENACIOUSLY RESORTING TO THE CONFRONTATION MOVES AGAINST 
THE DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF KOREA, FRANTICALLY 
STAGING MASSIVE WAR EXERCISES ON THE PLEA OF COPING WITH 
"THE NORTH'S STRATEGY FOR COMMUNISING SOUTH KOREA".
   IN ANOTHER DEVELOPMENT,  SOME TIME AGO, THE U.S. DEFENSE 
SECRETARY TALKED ABOUT "POSSIBLE PROVOCATION" BY THE NORTH 
AT THE NATIONAL SECURITY COMMITTEE MEETING OF THE HOUSE OF 
REPRESENTATIVES OF THE UNITED STATES AND THUS ENCOURAGED THE 
ANTI-DPRK CONFRONTATION MOVES OF THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS. 
   THE RECKLESS NEW WAR PROVOCATION MOVES OF THE U.S. RIGHT-
WING CONSERVATIVES AND THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS HAVE FURTHER 
AGGRAVATED THE INTER-KOREAN RELATIONS, RENDERING THE 
SITUATION ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA EXTREMELY ACUTE SO THAT A 
WAR MAY BREAK OUT IN KOREA ANY MOMENT.
   RIDICULOUS ARE THE UTTERANCES OF THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS 
ABOUT "NORTH'S STRATEGY FOR COMMUNISING SOUTH KOREA". THE 
OUTCRIES  ARE NOTHING BUT A DASTARDLY RIGMAROLE TO JUSTIFY 
THEIR FRANTIC WAR PREPARATIONS.
   THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, DRIVEN INTO THE RULING 
CRISIS OWING TO THE HANBO INCIDENT, THE LARGEST-EVER SCANDAL 
IN SOUTH KOREA, IS TOTALLY ISOLATED AND REJECTED AT HOME AND 
ABROAD.
   THIS IS WHY HE IS RESORTING TO SUCH TRITE METHODS TO 
EXTRICATE HIMSELF FROM THE CRISIS AND PROLONG HIS REMAINING 
DAYS BY DIVERTING PUBLIC ATTENTION ELSEWHERE.
   THE UNITED STATES IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS.
   WE CANNOT BUT TAKE A SERIOUS VIEW OF THE FACT THAT 
BELLICOSE FORCES OF THE UNITED STATES ARE VOCIFERATING ABOUT 
"POSSIBLE PROVOCATION" BY THE DPRK AT A TIME WHEN THE DPRK-
U.S. AGREED FRAMEWORK IS BEING IMPLEMENTED.
   THEY DO NOT WANT THE IMPROVED RELATIONS BETWEEN THE DPRK 
AND THE UNITED STATES. SO, THEY ARE FURTHER AGGRAVATING THE 
SITUATION ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA, SIDING WITH THE SOUTH 
KOREAN PUPPETS IN THEIR WAR EXERCISES.
   OUR PEOPLE AND PEOPLE'S ARMY ARE FOLLOWING THE RECKLESS 
WAR PREPARATIONS OF THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS AND THE 
BELLICOSE U.S. FORCES WITH SHARPENED VIGILANCE.
   IF THE ENEMY DARES TO IGNITE A WAR, THEY WILL DEAL AN 
ANNIHILATING BLOW TO THE ENEMY IN TIME AND COMPLETELY 
REMOVE THE ROOT CAUSE OF WAR FROM THE KOREAN PENINSULA.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il's work rejecting abuses ofsocialism 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- RODONG SINMUN TODAY 
DEDICATES AN ARTICLE TO THE FOURTH ANNIVERSARY OF THE 
PUBLICATION OF THE WORK "ABUSES OF SOCIALISM ARE 
INTOLERABLE" BY SECRETARY KIM JONG IL (MARCH 1, 1993).
   THE ARTICLE POINTS OUT THAT THE WORK HAS DEALT A HEAVY 
BLOW AT THE IMPERIALISTS AND THE REACTIONARIES IN THEIR ANTI-
SOCIALIST PROPAGANDA AND HAS ALSO INSPIRED HUMANKIND WITH 
CONFIDENCE IN SOCIALISM.  IT SAYS:
   THE WORK CLEARLY PROVES THE VALIDITY OF THE SOCIALIST 
CAUSE ON THE BASIS OF THE JUCHE-ORIENTED SOCIALIST IDEAS AND 
BITTERLY CONDEMNS THE SOCIALIST RENEGADES AS IMMORAL FELLOWS 
BETRAYING THE PEOPLE'S TRUST. IT REFLECTS THE STEADFAST RED 
FLAG SPIRIT OF GENERAL KIM JONG IL, WHO HAS A STRONG FAITH 
AND WILL TO DEFEND SOCIALISM AND GUIDE THE WORKERS' PARTY 
AND PEOPLE OF KOREA ALONG THE ROAD OF SOCIALISM IN ANY 
ADVERSITY. HIS INFINITE LOYALTY TO THE SOCIALIST CAUSE  IS 
MIRRORED IN HIS THEORIES AND IDEAS ON THE INTRINSIC 
ADVANTAGES OF SOCIALISM CENTRED ON THE MASSES OF THE PEOPLE 
AND IN THE CONTENTS OF THE WORK, WHICH CATEGORICALLY REJECTS 
ABUSES OF SOCIALISM BY THE TRAITORS TO THE REVOLUTION.
   IN THE WORK HE, WITH CLAIRVOYANCE, DESCRIBED THE 
SOCIALIST RENEGADES' ABUSING SOCIALISM AS "TOTALITARIAN", 
"BARRACKS-LIKE" AND "ADMINISTRATIVE AND COMMANDING" AS AN 
OFFSPRING OF THE IMPERIALISTS' ANTI-SOCIALIST STRATEGY AND 
PROVED IN A PROFOUND WAY THE UNREASONABLENESS OF THEIR 
SLANDER AGAINST SOCIALISM.
   HE ALSO SAID THE IMPORTANT REASON THAT THE ABSURD ABUSES 
OF SOCIALISM CAUSED IDEOLOGICAL CONFUSION AMONG PEOPLE IS 
LESS IMPORTANCE GIVEN TO IDEOLOGICAL EDUCATION AND THE 
FAILURE TO SUCCESSFULLY CARRY ON SOCIALIST CONSTRUCTION AND 
AWAKEN THE PEOPLE TO THE ADVANTAGES OF SOCIALISM THROUGH 
THEIR DAILY LIFE.
   WITH DISTINGUISHED INTELLIGENCE HE LEARNED THAT ALL THE 
ANTI-SOCIALIST PROPAGANDA WAS AIMED AT DECRYING SOCIALIST 
COLLECTIVISM AND EULOGIZING BOURGEOIS INDIVIDUALISM AND GAVE 
A COMPREHENSIVE AND CLEAR-CUT EXPOSITION OF THE REACTIONARY 
NATURE OF BOURGEOIS INDIVIDUALISM AND THE ADVANTAGES OF 
SOCIALIST COLLECTIVISM.

articles.title: Papers call for powerful grand march toward reunification
articles.content:
Press review
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- RODONG SINMUN TODAY 
FRONTPAGES A REPORT THAT SECRETARY KIM JONG IL SENT THANKS TO
OFFICIALS, WORKING PEOPLE AND PUBLIC SECURITY WORKERS FOR 
DOING GOOD THINGS FOR SOCIETY AND THE COLLECTIVE.
   PAPERS REPORT THAT SECRETARY KIM JONG IL SENT A WREATH TO 
THE BIER OF THE LATE VICE MARSHAL KIM KWANG JIN, FIRST VICE-
MINISTER OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMED FORCES.
   RODONG SINMUN CARRIES MESSAGES OF GREETINGS TO SECRETARY
KIM JONG IL FROM FOREIGN PARTY AND STATE LEADERS AND AN 
ACCOUNT OF EVENTS HELD ABROAD ON HIS 55TH BIRTHDAY.
   UNDER THE TITLE "UPHOLDING PEERLESS GREAT MAN" MINJU 
JOSON EDITS AN ARTICLE HEADLINED "ENDLESS EPIC OF LOYALTY 
AND DEVOTION", ILLUSTRATED BY A PICTURE OF COMRADE 
KIM JONG IL EXAMINING A MODEL BOARD OF THE "KUMSUSAN 
MEMORIAL PALACE" ON MARCH 1, 1995.
   RODONG SINMUN DEDICATES AN ARTICLE TO THE FOURTH 
ANNIVERSARY OF THE PUBLICATION OF SECRETARY KIM JONG IL'S WORK
"ABUSES OF SOCIALISM ARE INTOLERABLE".
   PAPERS EDITORIALLY CALL FOR MORE VIGOROUSLY MAKING GRAND 
REUNIFICATION MARCH UNDER THE BANNER OF NATIONAL 
INDEPENDENCE AND PEACE ON THE OCCASION OF THE 78TH 
ANNIVERSARY OF THE MARCH 1 POPULAR UPRISING. GIVEN IN THE 
PRESS IS AN ACCOUNT OF A PYONGYANG MEETING ON THIS OCCASION.
   CONSPICUOUS IN PAPERS IS NEWS OF THE FULFILMENT OF THE 
FEBRUARY PLANS AT INDUSTRIAL ESTABLISHMENTS IN DIFFERENT 
DOMAINS OF THE NATIONAL ECONOMY.
   AN ARTICLE OF RODONG SINMUN DEALS WITH THE IMMORTAL 
REVOLUTIONARY FEATS PERFORMED BY KIM HYONG JIK, AN 
INDOMITABLE REVOLUTIONARY FIGHTER, IN FORMING AND LEADING 
THE KOREAN NATIONAL ASSOCIATION.
   IT IS REPORTED IN PAPERS THAT RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS IN 
KOREA DISCUSSED MEASURES TO CARRY INTO PRACTICE THE PROPOSAL 
OF A JOINT MEETING OF POLITICAL PARTIES AND ORGANIZATIONS IN 
THE NORTHERN HALF OF KOREA.
   CARRIED IN RODONG SINMUN IS A STATEMENT ISSUED BY A 
SPOKESMAN FOR THE CENTRAL COMMITTEE OF THE GENERAL 
FEDERATION OF TRADE UNIONS OF KOREA DENOUNCING THE TRAITOR 
KIM YOUNG SAM'S "STATEMENT TO THE PEOPLE".
   ACCORDING TO THE PAPER, THE FAMILY MEMBERS OF THE OLD KIM 
IN SO, AN UNCONVERTED LONG-TERM PRISONER IN SOUTH KOREA, WHO 
ARE LIVING IN THE NORTHERN HALF OF KOREA, SENT A LETTER TO 
HUMAN RIGHTS ORGANIZATIONS IN SOUTH KOREA AS REGARDS THE 
SOUTH KOREAN AUTHORITIES' CONTINUED INHUMAN ACTS AGAINST HIM.
   CONVEYED IN THE PRESS IS NEWS THAT MORE THAN 131,000 
PEOPLE OF 107 TRADE UNIONS UNDER THE "CONFEDERATION 
OF TRADE UNIONS" IN SOUTH KOREA STAGED A STRIKE ON FRIDAY.
   IN THE SEMI-MONTHLY REVIEW OF THE SOUTH KOREAN SITUATION, 
RODONG SINMUN DEALS WITH THE CEASELESS STRUGGLE OF THE 
PEOPLE FROM ALL STRATA TO PUNISH THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, 
THE RINGLEADER OF THE HANBO INCIDENT. 
   MINJU JOSON RUNS AN ARTICLE BRANDING THE HANBO INCIDENT 
AS THE LARGEST POWER-BACKED SCANDAL.
   RODONG SINMUN CARRIES ANSWERS OF A SPOKESMAN FOR THE DPRK 
FOREIGN MINISTRY GIVEN TO QUESTIONS RAISED BY KCNA IN 
CONNECTION WITH THE FACT THAT JAPAN RECENTLY EXPRESSED ITS 
WILLINGNESS TO CONTINUE TAKING PART IN THE ESTABLISHMENT OF 
THEATRE MISSILE DEFENCE SYSTEM WHICH THREATENS PEACE AND 
STABILITY ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA AND THE ASIAN REGION.
   THE PAPER IN A COMMENTARY DENOUNCES THE UNITED STATES' 
BASE MOVES TO DISORGANIZE ASIAN COUNTRIES FROM WITHIN 
THROUGH "RADIO FREE ASIA".
   IN AN ARTICLE MARKING THE DAY OF BIKINI THE PAPER SAYS 
THE DISASTER ON BIKINI ISLAND SHOULD NOT BE REPEATED.

articles.title: Lesson given by Bikini
articles.content:
Papers call for powerful grand march toward reunification
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- PYONGYANG-BASED PAPERS TODAY 
DEDICATE EDITORIALS TO THE 78TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE 
MARCH FIRST POPULAR UPRISING, A NATIONWIDE ANTI-JAPANESE 
RESISTANCE.
   EDITORIALS CALL UPON ALL THE KOREANS IN THE NORTH, THE 
SOUTH AND OVERSEAS TO WAGE A MORE POWERFUL GRAND MARCH 
TOWARD REUNIFICATION UNDER THE BANNER OF NATIONAL 
INDEPENDENCE AND PEACE.
   THE MARCH FIRST POPULAR UPRISING TEACHES A SERIOUS LESSON 
THAT IF THE POPULAR MASSES ARE TO WIN IN THEIR STRUGGLE FOR 
NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND FREEDOM, THEY SHOULD WAGE AN 
ORGANISED STRUGGLE BASED ON A SCIENTIFIC STRATEGY AND 
TACTICS UNDER THE GUIDANCE OF AN OUTSTANDING LEADER AND 
ANSWER COUNTERREVOLUTIONARY VIOLENCE WITH REVOLUTIONARY 
VIOLENCE. AN EDITORIAL OF RODONG SINMUN SAYS:
   THE DESIRE OF THE MARCH FIRST POPULAR UPRISERS HAS NOT 
YET BEEN REALISED IN SOUTH KOREA, ONE HALF OF THE COUNTRY, 
AND THE SOUTH KOREAN PEOPLE ARE SUFFERING FROM THE COLONIAL 
RULE BY OUTSIDE FORCES, THEIR NATIONAL DIGNITY AND 
SOVEREIGNTY BEING RUTHLESSLY VIOLATED.
   ALL THE FELLOW COUNTRYMEN IN THE NORTH, THE SOUTH AND 
OVERSEAS SHOULD EXPOSE AND RESOLUTELY FRUSTRATE THE SOUTH 
KOREAN RULERS' POLICY OF DEPENDENCE UPON OUTSIDE FORCES, 
FLUNKEYIST AND TREACHEROUS PRACTICES AND THEIR POLICY OF 
CONFRONTATION AND WAR AT EVERY STEP UNDER THE BANNER OF 
NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND PEACE AND TURN OUT VALIANTLY IN 
THE STRUGGLE TO MAKE A TURNING-POINT IN THE MOVEMENT FOR THE 
INDEPENDENT AND PEACEFUL REUNIFICATION OF THE COUNTRY.
   THE UNITED STATES MUST AFFIRMATIVELY RESPOND TO OUR 
REALISTIC PROPOSAL FOR NEGOTIATION TO REPLACE THE INSTABLE 
ARMISTICE SYSTEM WITH A DURABLE PEACE SYSTEM IN KEEPING WITH 
THE IDEA OF THE DPRK-U.S. AGREED FRAMEWORK.
   JAPAN MUST ABANDON THE ANACHRONISTIC POLICY OF EXCLUSIVE 
FAVOR FOR SOUTH KOREA AND DO THINGS HELPFUL TOWARD PEACE ON 
THE KOREAN PENINSULA AND ITS PEACEFUL REUNIFICATION. 
   AN EDITORIAL OF MINJU JOSON SAYS THAT ALL THE FELLOW 
COUNTRYMEN SHOULD BECOME UNDERTAKERS OF THE NATIONAL 
REUNIFICATION AND MAKE TANGIBLE CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE 
PROMOTION OF GREAT NATIONAL UNITY AND THE REUNIFICATION OF 
THE COUNTRY, UPHOLDING THE TEN-POINT PROGRAMME OF THE GREAT 
UNITY OF THE WHOLE NATION.

Lesson given by Bikini
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- THE BIKINI HOLOCAUST SHOWS
THAT THE IMPERIALISTS ARE NUCLEAR FANATICS WHO POSE THREAT 
TO THE EXISTENCE OF HUMANKIND, SAYS RODONG SINMUN TODAY.
   ON "DAY OF BIKINI" THE DAILY CARRIES AN ARTICLE CALLING 
FOR NUCLEAR DISARMAMENT.  IT SAYS:
   NUCLEAR DISARMAMENT IS VITAL TO REMOVING NUCLEAR 
THREAT FROM THE GLOBE. WHAT IS IMPORTANT TO THIS END IS THAT 
THE NUCLEAR POWERS SHOULD NOT CONFINE THEMSELVES TO 
SUSPENSION OF NUCLEAR TESTING BUT ELIMINATE ALL THE NUCLEAR 
WEAPONS.
   JAPAN'S NUCLEAR ARMAMENT, WHICH HAS BECOME ONE OF THE 
ROOT CAUSES OF NUCLEAR THREAT TO HUMANKIND, SHOULD BE 
BROUGHT TO A HALT AT ONCE. 
   AS LONG AS THE IMPERIALISTS AND NUCLEAR WEAPONS EXIST, 
HUMANKIND CAN NEVER ESCAPE FROM ANOTHER "BIKINI HOLOCAUST". 
THIS IS THE LESSON GIVEN BY BIKINI.
   ALL THE PEACELOVING PEOPLE OF THE WORLD SHOULD UNITE WITH 
EACH OTHER CLOSELY AND LAUNCH A POWERFUL STRUGGLE TO ARREST 
THE IMPERIALISTS' RECKLESS NUCLEAR ARMS BUILDUP AND HAVE ALL 
THE NUCLEAR WEAPONS ELIMINATED.

Pamphlet "Korea Along Communist Road" published
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- A PAMPHLET "KOREA ALONG 
COMMUNIST ROAD" CAME OFF THE PRESS.
   THE PUBLISHER IS REVEREND VOKOUN, CHAIRMAN OF THE EASTERN 
EUROPEAN COUNCIL OF RELIGION PROPAGANDA AND INFORMATION 
CENTRE.
   THE PAMPHLET CARRIES ARTICLES TITLED "REVIEW OF HISTORY", 
"KIM IL SUNG", "REVOLUTION MEANS NOT ONLY STRUGGLE. 
REVOLUTION IS STEADY DEVELOPMENT".
   IN AN ARTICLE HEADLINED "KIM JONG IL", THE PAMPHLET 
INTRODUCES THE BIOGRAPHY OF SECRETARY KIM JONG IL, NOTING HE 
IS SUCCESSFULLY CARRYING FORWARD AND ACCOMPLISHING THE 
REVOLUTIONARY CAUSE OF THE GREAT LEADER PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG.
   THE PAMPHLET WAS PUBLISHED ON THE OCCASION OF THE 85TH 
BIRTH ANNIVERSARY OF PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG AND THE 55TH 
BIRTHDAY OF SECRETARY KIM JONG IL.

GFTUK denounces  Kim Young Sam
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- THE SPOKESMAN OF THE CENTRAL 
COMMITTEE OF THE GENERAL FEDERATION OF TRADE UNIONS OF KOREA 
(GFTUK) IN A STATEMENT ON FRIDAY DENOUNCED THE KIM YOUNG SAM 
FOR TRYING TO AVOID THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE 
CRITICAL SITUATION OF SOUTH KOREA IN A RECENT "STATEMENT TO 
THE PEOPLE".
   KIM YOUNG SAM SHIFTED THE BLAME FOR THE HANBO INCIDENT 
ON TO SOME STOOGES TO CONCEAL HIS TRUE COLORS AS THE 
RINGLEADER OF THE INCIDENT, THE SPOKESMAN SAID, ADDING:
   THIS CLEARLY PROVES THAT HE IS A POLITICAL SWINDLER.
   THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS TRY TO FIND A WAY OUT OF THE 
SERIOUS RULING CRISIS BY DIVERTING PUBLIC ATTENTION TO 
"CRISIS OF SECURITY". BUT THESE ARE NO MORE THAN LAST-DITCH 
EFFORTS OF THE DOOMED.
   THOUGH KIM YOUNG SAM IS TRYING TO DECEIVE PEOPLE AGAIN 
WITH EMPTY SLOGANS OF "LIQUIDATION OF IRREGULARITIES AND 
CORRUPTION" AND "REVIVAL OF ECONOMY", HE MUST BE OUSTED AND 
STERNLY PUNISHED FOR THE CRIMES HE COMMITTED DURING FOUR 
YEARS OF OFFICE.

articles.title: DPRK delegation leaves for U.S.
articles.content:
Funeral of late Kim Kwang Jin
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 1 (KCNA) -- A STATE FUNERAL OF VICE
MARSHAL OF THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY KIM KWANG JIN, FIRST 
VICE-MINISTER OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMED FORCES, WAS HELD IN 
PYONGYANG TODAY.
   KIM KWANG JIN, MEMBER OF THE CENTRAL COMMITTEE OF THE 
WORKERS' PARTY OF KOREA (WPK), MEMBER OF THE PARTY CENTRAL 
MILITARY COMMISSION AND MEMBER OF THE NATIONAL DEFENCE 
COMMISSION OF THE DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF KOREA, 
DIED OF AN INCURABLE DISEASE ON FEBRUARY 27 AT THE AGE OF 
69.  PEOPLE'S ARMY SOLDIERS AND CITIZENS SAW OFF THE HEARSE 
ALONG STREETS OF PYONGYANG, EXPRESSING DEEP CONDOLENCES OVER 
THE DEATH OF A MILITARY VETERAN WHO DEVOTED ALL HIS WISDOM 
AND ENERGIES TO STRENGTHENING THE KPA INTO AN INVINCIBLE 
REVOLUTIONARY ARMY THROUGH THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE JUCHE-
BASED MILITARY LINE OF THE WPK.
   A CEREMONY FOR BIDDING THE LAST FAREWELL TO THE DECEASED 
WAS SOLEMNLY HELD AT THE PATRIOTIC MARTYRS' CEMETERY IN THE 
SUBURBS OF PYONGYANG.
   IN HIS FUNERAL ADDRESS, KPA VICE MARSHAL JO MYONG ROK, 
DIRECTOR OF THE GENERAL POLITICAL DEPARTMENT OF THE KPA, 
SAID THAT THE LIFE OF THE LATE KIM KWANG JIN WAS A CAREER OF 
A TRUE COMMUNIST REVOLUTIONARY SOLDIER, WHO DEVOTED HIS ALL 
TO THE PARTY AND THE REVOLUTION, THE COUNTRY AND THE PEOPLE 
TILL THE LAST MOMENT OF HIS LIFE.
   THE COFFIN OF THE DECEASED WAS LAID IN STATE IN THE 
CEMETERY WHILE THE DIRGE WAS PLAYED AND A VOLLEY OF RIFLES 
FIRED.
   THE PARTICIPANTS IN THE FUNERAL LAID WREATHS AT THE GRAVE 
AND OBSERVED A MOMENT'S SILENCE IN MEMORY OF THE DECEASED.
